item.title: #007: An Old Interview (or, A Time Capsule To 2019 Sarah)
item.description: What is this, exactly? While going through some old files on an old shared network drive trying to track down an old script I’m working on re-writing, I found this series of interview answers that I gave for a blog that wanted to interview me. If that seems a strange way of doing things, it kind of is. It’s also more or less the norm on a lot of journalistic outlets nowadays, especially those that cater to small press books and records.
